title: Topic 001 Question 036
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that contains two user subscriptions named fabrikam.com and contoso.com. Each user subscription has a unique set of plans, offers, and quotas.
You need to remove the fabrikam.com user subscription and its associated plans, offers, and quotas.
Which five actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
